tag: html body div section div section div article div div p span
content: , the personal matter was a strange episode at the team?s Minneapolis team hotel Saturday that involved Griffen pacing the lobby and threatening to ?shoot someone.?

tag: html body div section div section div article div div blockquote p span
content: According to the report, at one point staff members moved to the back of the office while Griffen paced around in the lobby.

tag: html body div section div section div article div div blockquote p span
content: Police dispatch audio archived online includes a dispatcher saying that the suspect said to the staff that if someone wouldn?t let him in his room that he was going to shoot someone. Police said no gun was ever seen.

tag: html body div section div section div article div div blockquote p span
content: At one point, the report said the caller stated that Griffen threatened to assault staff members and was laying on the lobby floor.

tag: html body div section div section div article div div div div div p small span
html body div section div section div article div div p span
content: Griffen was reportedly not arrested at the scene after he apparently ?left of his own accord,? presumably before police arrived. He was still held out Sunday, and the Vikings are reportedly treating this as a ?personal health-related issue,? per NFL Network?s Tom Pelissero:

tag: html body div section div section div article div div p span
content: Griffen had reportedly missed three practices leading up to the game due to a knee injury, and was listed as a non-participant at practice

tag: html body div section div section div article div div p a span
